Name: Kai Wegner
Description: The leader of the CDU in Berlin is a supporter of yours and offered help with getting you nominated as chancellor candidate

Name: Markus Blume
Description: As general secretary of the CSU, he's helping drive CSU turnout in Bavaria.

Name: Markus Ferber
Description: As head of Hanns Seidel Foundation, Ferber can help you get access to more accurate polls through the foundation.

Name: Sebastian Brehm
Description: Brehm is the CSU's expert on fiscal policy in the Bundestag and eager to advise you on all things concerning the economy.

Name: Joseph Göppel
Description: Also know as the 'green conscience of the CDU/CSU', he's happy to advise you on environmental questions.

Name: Melanie Huml
Description: As the incumbent Minister of Health in Bavaria, she can advice you on all questions surrounding that topic and COVID.

Name: Armin Laschet
Description: Laschet will turn out the CDU in his homestate of North Rhine-Westphalia and campaign with you all over Germany.
LockedDescription: The Minister-President and party leader of the CDU also has ambitions to become chancellor - don't fight too dirty if you want him onboard.

Name: Paul Ziemiak
Description: Coordinating closer with Ziemiak will help benefit you nationwide and be helpful if he's campaigning for you somewhere.
LockedDescription: The general secretary of the CDU wants to see a fair nomination process.

Name: Rita Süssmuth
Description: During her long and storied career, Süssmuth made connections across the political spectrum. SHe'D be an asset in coalition talks with more leftwing parties.
LockedDescription: This CDU politician has advocated for a more liberal abortion law for a long time - agree with her to recruit her.

Name: Horst Seehofer
Description: Seehofer is popular in Bavaria and has some advice on how to deal with social topics.
LockedDescription: The current minister of the Interior and former CSU leader is known for his hardline stance on refugees and generally conservative outlook.

Name: Daniel Günther
Description: As he leads a Jamaica Coalition himself, Günther can help when talking to the Greens and FDP - as well as campaign in Schleswig-Holstein
LockedDescription: This CDU Minister-President from Schleswig-Holstein wants you to push the party in a more modern direction.

Name: Reiner Haseloff
Description: Haseloff's popularity will not only help you in Saxony-Anhalt, his home state, but all of East Germany.
LockedDescription: A very popular East German Minister-President - maybe you can convince him to work for you when you visit him?

Name: Tilman Kuban
Description: Kuban wants to advise you on digitalization and mobilise the JU to help you nationwide.
LockedDescription: The chairman of the CDU/CSU youth organization JU would like you to involve the JU in your campaign.

Name: Friedrich Merz
Description: Whether you need economic advice or help targetting FDP and AfD voters, Merz is your man.
LockedDescription: One of the leading voices of the conservative wing - to get him, show that you share his outlook.

Name: Hans-Georg Maaßen
Description: Hiring Maaßen would show the AfD you're serious about working with them, but be controversial with almost everyone else.
LockedDescription: This very controversial former head of the Federal Office for the Protection of the Constitution advocates for cooperation between the CDU and AfD.

Name: Gerd Müller
Description: The current Minister for for Economic Cooperation and Development is a principled man - hiring him could help with your image.
LockedDescription: To recruit the current Minister for for Economic Cooperation and Development, soften your position on refugees.

Name: Edmund Stoiber
Description: Bavarians will love to see you campaign with Stoiber, and he has some tips about avoiding to be seen as opportunistic as well.
LockedDescription: This legendary CSU politician and former chancellor candidate wnats you to keep the CSU strong despite running a national campaign.

Name: Angela Merkel
Description: While Merkel doesn't have a lot of time to campaign, her popularity will still help you nationwide. She also has some advice on foreign policy.
LockedDescription: To get the current chancellor herself to help you, defend her legacy and have the CDU elites endorse your candidacy.
